reviewText: Using his experience as a successful inventor, Pal Asija provides an OVERVIEW of some of the pitfalls inventors may experience in patenting intellectual property such as software. This DVD appears to be an amateur recording of a lecture given to small audience using slides with an overhead projector.  If you purchase this video, I suggest you take notes as you will not want to view it more than once due to the video quality.  In my copy, many of the charts were difficult to see and the end of the lecture cuts off abruptly.  It gave me enough information to know that I need more information!
